title: Hunter shot, killed after friend mistook him for deer in Georgia woods, authorities say
text:
Hunter shot, killed after friend mistook him for deer in Georgia woods, authorities say originally appeared on abcnews.go.com

A hunter has been killed after one of his companions shot him while mistaking him for a deer in Georgia, according to authorities.

(MORE: Oklahoma woman fined after bragging to game warden about killing deer on dating app)

A group of hunters were in a wooded area near Myers Hill Road in Glynn County, Georgia, on Saturday when the victim, Bobby Lane, was shot by his friend, Hector Romero, according to a release from the Glynnfoliage Police Department.

PHOTO: The 500 block of Myers Hill Road in Glynn County, Georgia is seen here. (Google) More

Lane was shot while shielded by heavy foilage, police said.

(MORE: Judge orders poacher who helped kill hundreds of deer to watch 'Bambi' repeatedly while in jail)

Romero helped transport Lane to the Friendly Express convenience store on Highway 82 and 303, where the group of hunters were met by first responders, police said.

PHOTO: A white-tailed Deer buck is seen in early autumn. (Danita Delimont/Getty Images/Gallo Images) More

Lane was later pronounced dead at the hospital.

(MORE: Hunter who says he mistook woman for a deer charged with manslaughter)

Additional information was not immediately available.

The Georgia Department of Natural Resources is assisting in the investigation.
description: A hunter has been killed after one of his companions shot him while mistaking him for  a deer in Georgia, according to authorities.  A group of hunters were in a wooded area near Myers Hill Road in Glynn County, Georgia, on Saturday when the victim, Bobby Lane, was shot by his friend, Hector Romero,
